mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.account_id AS "accountId", a.merchant_id AS "merchantId", a.merchant_log_id_form AS "merchantLogIdForm", a.balance_amount_changes_form AS "balanceAmountChangesForm", a.balance_amount_form AS "balanceAmountForm", a.balance_direction_form AS "balanceDirectionForm", a.trans_no_form AS "transNoForm", a.payment_id_form AS "paymentIdForm", a.type_form AS "typeForm", a.merchant_log_id_to AS "merchantLogIdTo", a.balance_amount_changes_to AS "balanceAmountChangesTo", a.balance_amount_to AS "balanceAmountTo", a.balance_direction_to AS "balanceDirectionTo", a.trans_no_to AS "transNoTo", a.payment_id_to AS "paymentIdTo", a.type_to AS "typeTo", a.category AS "category", a.status AS "status", a.create_time AS "createTime", a.update_time AS "updateTime"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO trial_balance_log( id, account_id, merchant_id, merchant_log_id_form, balance_amount_changes_form, balance_amount_form, balance_direction_form, trans_no_form, payment_id_form, type_form, merchant_log_id_to, balance_amount_changes_to, balance_amount_to, balance_direction_to, trans_no_to, payment_id_to, type_to, category, status, create_time, update_time ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{accountId}, #{merchantId}, #{merchantLogIdForm}, #{balanceAmountChangesForm}, #{balanceAmountForm}, #{balanceDirectionForm}, #{transNoForm}, #{paymentIdForm}, #{typeForm}, #{merchantLogIdTo}, #{balanceAmountChangesTo}, #{balanceAmountTo}, #{balanceDirectionTo}, #{transNoTo}, #{paymentIdTo}, #{typeTo}, #{category}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime} )
mapper.update: UPDATE trial_balance_log SET id = #{id}, account_id = #{accountId}, merchant_id = #{merchantId}, merchant_log_id_form = #{merchantLogIdForm}, balance_amount_changes_form = #{balanceAmountChangesForm}, balance_amount_form = #{balanceAmountForm}, balance_direction_form = #{balanceDirectionForm}, trans_no_form = #{transNoForm}, payment_id_form = #{paymentIdForm}, type_form = #{typeForm}, merchant_log_id_to = #{merchantLogIdTo}, balance_amount_changes_to = #{balanceAmountChangesTo}, balance_amount_to = #{balanceAmountTo}, balance_direction_to = #{balanceDirectionTo}, trans_no_to = #{transNoTo}, payment_id_to = #{paymentIdTo}, type_to = #{typeTo}, category = #{category}, status = #{status}, create_time = #{createTime}, update_time = #{updateTime} WHERE id = #{id}
